ComicInfo.Title: If Different Personalities Played Tarzan; The Bard of Madison Avenue; A Glossary of Cracked Definitions; Super Hero Hall of Fame; Famous Scenes from Great Doctor Movies (That Just Missed); Sonny & Cher Fashions Throughout History; A Tourist's Guide to Transylvania; The Same Shows as Performed on TV & Radio
ComicInfo.Summary:
British editions are identical to the US editions except for the price and cover date. The UK numbering includes Cracked Collectors' Editions.Tarzan as played by Adam West, Chet Huntley, Don Adams, Dan Blocker, Ed Sullivan, Don Knotts and others.
Sonny and Cher seen in various historical locales and adapting their fashions to suit the times.
How television programs would look if they were being performed on radio. Additionally, the image Cracked presents of their offices and the real version.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-05 17:41:12. [Issue ID 250421]
ComicInfo.Penciller: John Severin, John Langton, Vic Martin, Charlie Rodrigues
ComicInfo.Inker: John Severin, John Langton, Vic Martin, Charlie Rodrigues
